snippet: As the senatorial runoff in Texas between David Dewhurst and Ted Cruz approaches, strategists for both campaigns are optimistic and working hard.
lead_paragraph: As the senatorial runoff in Texas between David Dewhurst and Ted Cruz approaches, strategists for both campaigns are optimistic and working hard.

headline.seo: Pulling the Strings for the Cruz Campaign in Texas
headline.main: ‘Band of Brothers’ Pulls Strings for Cruz Campaign
headline.print_headline: ‘Band of Brothers’ Pulls Strings for Cruz Campaign
